pkgmetadata.longdescription: Standardized Comparison of Workflows in Mass Spectrometry-Based Bottom-Up Proteomics // Useful functions to analyze proteomic workflows including number of identifications, data completeness, missed cleavages, quantitative and retention time precision etc. Various software outputs are supported such as 'ProteomeDiscoverer', 'Spectronaut', 'DIA-NN' and 'MaxQuant'.
